```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```

```{r}
data = read.csv("~/Desktop/stat153/timeseries_project/Alcohol_Sales.csv")
plot(data$S4248SM144NCEN, type='l')
```

```{r}
log_data = log(data$S4248SM144NCEN)
plot(log_data, type='l')
```

```{r}
diff_data = diff(diff(log_data, 12, 1), 3, 1)
auto.arima(diff_data, allowmean=FALSE)
sarima(diff_data, 5, 0, 1)
```

```{r}
auto.arima(log_data, method="ML", allowdrift=FALSE)
sarima(log_data, 0, 1, 2)
```
